question: What is the theme of the virtual conference ‘India Global Week 2020’, being organised in the United Kingdom?
option1: Be The Revival: India and a Better New World
answer: Be The Revival: India and a Better New World
explanation:
A three-day virtual conference named ‘India Global Week 2020’ is being organised in the United Kingdom.
The theme of the conference is “Be The Revival: India and a Better New World”. The inaugural address of the first day of the conference was delivered by the Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi. The conference is addressed by about 250 international speakers and will have 5000 participants.
